\subsection{Detailed Description}
An abstract string type that defines the specifications for Unicode strings. 

Specific encodings are implemented as derived types of this class.

Chaos\+Core primarily uses U\+T\+F-\/8 encoded strings, for further documentation on using Unicode strings see the \hyperlink{classchaos_1_1uni_1_1_u_t_f8_string}{U\+T\+F8\+String} documentation.

\subsubsection[{U\+String(const U\+String \&other)}]{\setlength{\rightskip}{0pt plus 5cm}chaos\+::uni\+::\+U\+String\+::\+U\+String (
\begin{DoxyParamCaption}
\item[{const {\bf U\+String} \&}]{other}
\end{DoxyParamCaption}
)\hspace{0.3cm}{\ttfamily [protected]}}\label{classchaos_1_1uni_1_1_u_string_a4ff2f82ba14d36b18366076969ecd164}


Copy constructor. 

Calling this constructor from a derived class\textquotesingle{}s initialiser lists will cause the {\ttfamily m\+\_\+data}, {\ttfamily m\+\_\+data\+\_\+length}, and {\ttfamily m\+\_\+length} attributes to be copied. 

\subsection{Member Function Documentation}
\hypertarget{classchaos_1_1uni_1_1_u_string_a9eae392a87be35a21ae1d905b446c7e4}{}\index{chaos\+::uni\+::\+U\+String@{chaos\+::uni\+::\+U\+String}!assign\+\_\+raw@{assign\+\_\+raw}}
\index{assign\+\_\+raw@{assign\+\_\+raw}!chaos\+::uni\+::\+U\+String@{chaos\+::uni\+::\+U\+String}}
\subsubsection[{assign\+\_\+raw(const char $\ast$data, size\+\_\+t length=\+U\+String\+::npos)}]{\setlength{\rightskip}{0pt plus 5cm}virtual void chaos\+::uni\+::\+U\+String\+::assign\+\_\+raw (
\begin{DoxyParamCaption}
\item[{const char $\ast$}]{data, }
\item[{size\+\_\+t}]{length = {\ttfamily {\bf U\+String\+::npos}}}
\end{DoxyParamCaption}
)\hspace{0.3cm}{\ttfamily [protected]}, {\ttfamily [virtual]}}\label{classchaos_1_1uni_1_1_u_string_a9eae392a87be35a21ae1d905b446c7e4}


Assigns the internal raw array ({\ttfamily m\+\_\+data}) of this string to be a be a copy of the provided data. 

This operation will cause any existing data to be deleted, new memory allocated, and copied from the provided data.

\begin{DoxyWarning}{Warning}
This will not calculate the {\ttfamily m\+\_\+length} attribute (the number of symbols in the string) since this function only deals with raw byte data and not specific encodings. The {\ttfamily m\+\_\+length} attribute should be calculated by derived classes in their implementations of this function.
\end{DoxyWarning}

\begin{DoxyParams}{Parameters}
{\em data} & Data array to be copied to the {\ttfamily m\+\_\+data} attribute of this string. \\
\hline
{\em length} & The length of the supplied data in bytes. If this is set to to \hyperlink{classchaos_1_1uni_1_1_u_string_a5002d169446e9ab2baf8a028ec6ee9b0}{chaos\+::uni\+::\+U\+String\+::npos}, this function will calculate the input data length with the expectation that it is N\+U\+L\+L terminated. However if the input data length is known it is recommended that it is supplied for performance purposes. \\
\hline
\end{DoxyParams}
